hero.title: All-in-One Healthcare Management Platform
hero.subtitle: Everything your practice needs to deliver exceptional patient care

features.title: Patient Records (EMR)
features.description: Digital medical records with complete patient history and documentation

features.title: Appointments & Scheduling
features.description: Online booking, calendar management, and automated reminders

features.title: Tests & Scans Management
features.description: Lab orders, imaging integration, and results tracking

features.title: Doctors & Staff Management
features.description: Provider profiles, schedules, and performance tracking

features.title: Operations & Procedures
features.description: Surgical management from pre-op to post-op care

features.title: Inventory Management
features.description: Real-time stock tracking and automated reordering

features.title: Revenue Analytics
features.description: Financial insights, billing analytics, and reporting

features.title: Security & Compliance
features.description: Healthcare data privacy compliant with enterprise-grade security

steps.title: Consultation
steps.description: Understanding your practice's needs, workflows, and requirements. The team analyzes your current processes, identifies customization needs, and creates a tailored implementation plan.

steps.title: Setup
steps.description: Technical configuration and deployment of the platform. This includes customizing templates, migrating existing patient data, integrating with labs/imaging systems, and configuring security settings.

steps.title: Training
steps.description: Hands-on staff training based on user roles (doctors, nurses, admin staff). Includes system orientation, practical sessions, video tutorials, and ongoing support to ensure smooth adoption.

steps.title: Go Live
steps.description: Official launch of the software in your practice. The platform goes live with dedicated support teams monitoring performance, addressing issues, and gathering feedback for continuous improvement.
